step1.name: What's your event name?
step1.title: Create a new event (step 1/3)

step2.projectTypeHoverboardDetail: The talks/speakers/schedule will be retrieved directly on page load from your own Firestore database that follow Hoverboard v2 model.
step2.projectTypeJsonurlDetail: Provide an url to a .json that you‚Äôll either host (on gist.github.com or another static server) or a dynamic answer from your own database/api. The json model will need to match OpenFeedback one, you‚Äôll be able to check it on the next screen.
step2.projectTypeOpenfeedbackDetail: You can manually enter the talks/speakers/schedule on OpenFeedback. It will not be in sync with another service if you are using one. No additional configuration is required.
step2.projectTypeRequired: You need to choose how you want to setup the event.
step2.title: How do you want to load your data?

deleteEvent.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the event?
deleteEvent.confirmDescription: Deleting the event is definitive, there will not be any data left, all votes will be deleted.

errors.permissionDenied: Only the event owner can delete the event.

settingsUser.add: Add a new member to the event
settingsUser.emailNotValid: The member email must be a valid email, sneaky one!
settingsUser.emailRequired: The member email is required. You think you can invite Nobody? Well... no.
settingsUser.errorUserAlreadyInvited: The user is already invited to the event.
settingsUser.successInvite: The user has been invited to the project and should receive an email very soon.
settingsUser.invitationGetFail: Unable to get your invitation, ask for another one please.

settingsVotingForm.title: Vote items

settingsVotingForm.typeChangeDialogDesc: A vote type has changed or a vote item has been deleted. If there are already votes linked to this vote item, they will not be visible.

talks.cannotChange: Talks cannot be changed from OpenFeedback itself for this project. Refer to your external services configuration to do so.
talks.speakerMissing: This speaker is missing from the data, probably deleted
talks.titleAdd: Add a new talk to the event

moderation.hideDialogDescription: Hiding the vote will prevent everyone except the OpenFeedback member to see the vote. The user will still be able to update it but it will not be visible again until you decide to.
moderation.unhideDialogDescription: Unhiding the vote so it will be visible publicly.
